summary: Adds Giants who sell their nearby items, such as Mammoth Tusks.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff00ff][size=6][font=Impact]GIANT MERCHANTS AND VENDORS [/font]
[/size][/color]

[font=Impact][size=5][color=#00ff00]This mod adds 6 Giant Merchant/Traders to the game. They are located in:
Sleeping Tree Camp - Bomaz
Secunda's Kiss -  Ulgorus
Cradlecrush Rock - Mavor
Bleakwind Basin - Sinmur 
Tumble Arch Pass - Deatz
Steamcrag Camp - Zahs
Guldun Rock - Gorzinao[/color]

[color=#ffff00]They sell items that are always near Giant camps,  a few being:
Mammoth Tusks
Deer Hide
Mammoth Tusk Powder
Charred Skeever Hide
And many more! [/color]
[/size][/font]

[font=Impact][size=5].................................................................................................................................[/size][/font]

[color=#9900ff][font=Impact][size=6]PLANNED UPDATES (Very Soon)[/size][/font]

[/color][font=Impact][size=6][color=#9900ff]-More Giant Merchants in nearly all locations
-Giant Lore and stories 
-More items for Giants to sell (Tell me what you want!)
-Suggestions from you guys!  [/color]
[/size][/font]
[font=Impact][size=5].................................................................................................................................[/size][/font]

[font=Impact][size=6][color=#4bacc6]Thank you!! Check out my other mods here:
[/color]
[color=#a64d79]Please SEND IN VIDEOS! I WILL PUT THEM ON THE PAGE!
[/color]
[color=#ff0000]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55400/?

(Guards Attack Thugs, Assassins and More, my previous mod)[/color]

[color=#ff7700]http://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/2ymitk/announcing_the_development_of_total_guard_overhaul/

(Total Guard Overhaul, my next mod)[/color]
[/size][/font][font=Impact][size=5][color=#366092]
[/color][/size][/font]
author: Saadz
